results.title: Investigating the potential neuroprotective effects of statins on DNA damage in mouse striatum.
results.text_hl: Treatment with @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ showed a significant increase in levels of @<m>DISEASE_DNA_Virus_Infections</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D004266 @@@DNA damage@@@ (p < or = 0.0018) and @<m>DISEASE_DNA_Virus_Infections</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D004266 @@@DNA damage@@@ induced in vitro with @CHEMICAL_Hydrogen_Peroxide @CHEMICAL_MESH:D006861 @@@H(2)O(2)@@@ was significantly increased by @CHEMICAL_Pravastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017035 @@@pravastatin@@@ (p < or = 0.0001).

citations.NLM: Coetsee TN, Pretorius PJ, Terre'blanche G, Bergh JJ. Investigating the potential neuroprotective effects of statins on DNA damage in mouse striatum. Food Chem Toxicol. 2008 Sep;46(9):3186-92. PMID: 18692114
citations.BibTeX: @article{18692114, title={Investigating the potential neuroprotective effects of statins on DNA damage in mouse striatum.}, author={Coetsee TN and Pretorius PJ and Terre'blanche G and Bergh JJ}, journal={Food Chem Toxicol}, volume={46}, number={9}, pages={3186-92}}

results.title: Modulating effect of simvastatin on the DNA damage induced by doxorubicin in somatic cells of Drosophila melanogaster.
results.text_hl: Modulating effect of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ on the @<m>DISEASE_DNA_Virus_Infections</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D004266 @@@DNA damage@@@ induced by @CHEMICAL_Doxorubicin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D004317 @@@doxorubicin@@@ in somatic cells of @SPECIES_7227 @@@Drosophila melanogaster@@@.

citations.NLM: Orsolin PC, Silva-Oliveira RG, Nepomuceno JC. Modulating effect of simvastatin on the DNA damage induced by doxorubicin in somatic cells of Drosophila melanogaster. Food Chem Toxicol. 2016 Apr;90():10-7. PMID: 26829615
citations.BibTeX: @article{26829615, title={Modulating effect of simvastatin on the DNA damage induced by doxorubicin in somatic cells of Drosophila melanogaster.}, author={Orsolin PC and Silva-Oliveira RG and Nepomuceno JC}, journal={Food Chem Toxicol}, volume={90}, pages={10-7}}

results.title: A beneficial effect of simvastatin on DNA damage in 242T allele of the NADPH oxidase p22phox in hypercholesterolemic patients.
results.text_hl: RESULTS: @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ significantly reduced @<m>DISEASE_DNA_Virus_Infections</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D004266 @@@DNA@@@ damage as expressed by tail @<m>DISEASE_DNA_Virus_Infections</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D004266 @@@DNA@@@ (%, p< 0.001), tail length (mum, p<0.001) and tail moment on the @<m>DISEASE_DNA_Virus_Infections</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D004266 @@@DNA@@@ in lymphocytes (p<0.001) after 8 weeks.

citations.NLM: Shin MJ, Cho EY, Jang Y, Lee JH, Shim WH, Cho SY, Rim SJ, Kang SM, Ha JW, Ko YG, Kim SS, Park HY, Chung N. A beneficial effect of simvastatin on DNA damage in 242T allele of the NADPH oxidase p22phox in hypercholesterolemic patients. Clin Chim Acta. 2005 Oct;360(1-2):46-51. PMID: 15936011
citations.BibTeX: @article{15936011, title={A beneficial effect of simvastatin on DNA damage in 242T allele of the NADPH oxidase p22phox in hypercholesterolemic patients.}, author={Shin MJ and Cho EY and Jang Y and Lee JH and Shim WH and Cho SY and Rim SJ and Kang SM and Ha JW and Ko YG and Kim SS and Park HY and Chung N}, journal={Clin Chim Acta}, volume={360}, number={1-2}, pages={46-51}}

results.title: The Nuclear Orphan Receptor NR4A1 is Involved in the Apoptotic Pathway Induced by LPS and Simvastatin in RAW 264.7 Macrophages
results.text_hl: Here, we show that the nuclear orphan receptor @GENE_NR4A1 @GENE_15370 @@@NR4A1@@@ is involved in a caspase-independent apoptotic process induced by @CHEMICAL_Lipopolysaccharides @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008070 @@@LPS@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@. @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@-induced @GENE_NR4A1 @GENE_15370 @@@NR4A1@@@ expression in @CELLLINE_CVCL:0493 @@@RAW 264.7@@@ macrophages and ectopic expression of a dominant-negative mutant form of @GENE_NR4A1 @GENE_15370 @@@NR4A1@@@ effectively suppressed both @<m>DISEASE_DNA_Virus_Infections</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D004266 @@@DNA@@@ fragmentation and the disruption of mitochondrial membrane potential (MMP) during @CHEMICAL_Lipopolysaccharides @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008070 @@@LPS@@@- and @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@-induced apoptosis.

citations.NLM: Kim YC, Song SB, Lee SK, Park SM, Kim YS. The Nuclear Orphan Receptor NR4A1 is Involved in the Apoptotic Pathway Induced by LPS and Simvastatin in RAW 264.7 Macrophages Immune Netw. 2014 Apr;14(2):116-22. PMID: 24851101
citations.BibTeX: @article{24851101, title={The Nuclear Orphan Receptor NR4A1 is Involved in the Apoptotic Pathway Induced by LPS and Simvastatin in RAW 264.7 Macrophages}, author={Kim YC and Song SB and Lee SK and Park SM and Kim YS}, journal={Immune Netw}, volume={14}, number={2}, pages={116-22}}
